attributes.action: stem the tide of youth violence and terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sophie Lancaster, kicked to death in a public park for looking different, is the latest in a long line of victims of our out-of-control youth culture.

Decent people the length of Britain are sick to death of child mob-rule.

What has this country come to?
Kids stabbing kids, kids beating and killing adults for a LAUGH, kids drunk on the streets of Britain every day of the week, kids having kids before they're even adults themselves, kids getting rewarded by the Government for their behavour with free council houses and benefits.

WE DEMAND SOMETHING MEANINGFUL AND EFFECTIVE IS DONE, NOW!!

The government need to look at a change in the law, set up a dedicated taskforce that DELIVERS, more power to do something sooner and for longer, effective and deterrent sentences, more investment in youth activities, penalties for parents who fail to keep their kids in line, etc etc.

Please, do something.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
